search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Oneflow (oneflow.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Oneflow can be found at: [https://oneflow.com/pricing](https://oneflow.com/pricing). 【3:0†source】

Compare Plans
Join these companies making business flow
Can Oneflow help you save time and money?

Oneflow provides a range of benefits that can help organizations save time and money across the contract lifecycle.

Discover the ROI of Oneflow
We love startups!
Scale your business with digital contracts at startup-friendly prices. Tell us about your startup and we’ll be in touch.
Tell us about your startup
API and web forms
Use our API to automate contract workflows across all your systems. Make contract data processable and useful.
Message our team
Call +46 8 517 297 70
Start using Oneflow
Is Oneflow free?

We have a free plan that allows users to send, track and sign as many PDF contracts as possible. So if you’re happy with just signing PDF contracts, the answer is yes, it’s free. Forever.

What is the difference between free and trial accounts?

With our free plan, you can upload, send, track, and sign unlimited PDF contracts. However, with the free plan, you’ll not be able to enjoy the full experience of contract magic.

That’s why we also provide a trial of the full Oneflow experience for 14 days with no charge. With a trial account, you can try all the features our paid users love. For example, our contract editor. You can create stunning web-based contracts and make edits live, even after you’ve sent.

What happens after my trial ends?

Your trial account will expire automatically after 14 days. Don’t worry, you’ll still be able to log into your account or access your contracts. After the trial, you’ll automatically be in our free plan.


How can I extend my trial?

Feel free to do so in the Oneflow app on your own by clicking on “Upgrade”. You can also leave us a message here.

What kind of onboarding support can I expect?

Every user starts by attending an onboarding session facilitated by our friendly customer care team to run through the basics. We also have a comprehensive Help Center with all the how tos and tutorials that you need to get started. And you can always email us with your questions. Depending on your tier, you may also get a dedicated customer success manager to help with any questions you may have.

Scale up or down

There’s no need to commit to a huge investment for a perpetual license with our flexible SaaS platform and subscription-based pricing.

Safer contracts

It all boils down to this. Managing your contracts on one platform, in one place, is way more secure than storing in binders or folders that are hard to keep track of.

Customer support
Email, chat and phone support

Got questions, feedback, or want to bounce your ideas off us? Reach out to us anytime. We’d love to hear from you. 

 

Help and training

Join our weekly Oneflow Academy webinar or get a personalized training. Or, if you want to go at your own pace, find comprehensive resources on our Help Center. 

 

Experts on-hand

Our skilled team of business and technical experts are passionate about solving your challenges. We’ll make sure you get the help you need to be successful.

Have other questions?

If you have more questions on our pricing and plans, contact us so we can help.

Contact us
Call +46 8 517 297 70
Don’t just take our word for it…

“From board meeting protocols to GDPR agreements, and approval of keycards — Oneflow has removed the pains we weren’t even aware of.”

Read full story

Tor Myhrman

Head of Indirect Sourcing

Systembolaget

“The fact that Oneflow is 100% digital makes it so simple and flexible. It gives us peace of mind by providing control and a complete overview of our contract process at all times.”

Read full story

Elin Skoglund

HR Business Partner

Hedin Bil

“Oneflow is secure and really easy to use. It just works and saves us so much time. But, most importantly, we trust Oneflow with our documents because it meets our high security requirements.”

Read full story

Tobias Törnqvist

HR Specialist

Länsförsäkringar Älvsborg

“It took 12 minutes from calling the prospect to him receiving the proposal. I swear he ‘almost fainted’ when he saw how fast we could send a proposal.”

Read full story

Anders Berghagen

Sales & Marketing Director

Dormakaba

“It saves time and removes irritation. Before Oneflow, we spent a lot of time on coordinating, administrating, and booking time for signing. We immediately cut our lead times with this integration.”

Read full story

Pontus Esbo

CEO

Middlepoint

“The layout is really easy on the eye. When you want to work quickly and efficiently, you really want to avoid any kind of sensory overload and get distracted by a messy dashboard where you’ll struggle to find features. In Oneflow, the placement of every feature makes sense.”

Read full story

Kholod Hindi

Sales and Business Developer

Teamtailor

“It speeds up my work in many ways. Before it could take forever to get a contract sent and signed. Now it’s all done digitally and customers can sign right away on any device — laptop, mobile phone, iPad/tablet. Sooo easy.”

Read full story

Sanel Osmic

Team Lead

Bredband2

“It’s gone from monologue to dialogue. The two-way communication makes it more fun for the seller and the customer becomes more involved. Everyone wins!”

Read full story

Petter Lundqvist

Sales Manager

Falck

“I’d never thought it would be so easy. Oneflow saves me an incredible amount of time – there’s nothing I dislike about it. As a consultant sending out offers repeatedly, this is the best tool I’ve worked with.”

Read full story

Jörgen Persson

Consulting Director

Lernia Bemanning

Registered name:
Oneflow AB (publ)

Headquarters:
Gävlegatan 12a
113 30 Stockholm, Sweden
+46 8 517 297 70

Organisation number:
556903-2989

Place where the board has its seat:
Stockholm

Status of Oneflow

Made and hosted in the

We Care About Your Privacy

We use cookies to personalize content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you've provided to them or that they've collected from your use of their services. You consent to our cookies if you continue to use our website. To change your preferences at any time, click on the “Change cookie settings” icon in the lower left corner.

Close GDPR Cookie Banner

Strictly necessary cookies

Marketing cookies

Accept Cookies
Use necessary only
More information
Accept selection

FeaturesFreeEssentialsBusinessEnterprise 
Create 
PDF contracts Upload, send and e-sign PDF documents with legally binding e-signaturesDigital contracts Create, collaborate live, send and e-sign interactive web-based contracts with legally binding e-signaturesContract templates Create, share and manage templates for contracts you send over and over againTemplate library Use a template from the library and adjust them to your own liking, instead of starting from scratchMessage templates Save and manage email messages as templates to save time the next time you send similar messagesShared templates Share templates across different workspaces($)Replace contract Create a new contract with a different template using existing content($)Batch sending Send contracts in bulk($)($) 
Collaborate 
Comments Track activities and get notified of any comments or updatesAudit trail See all the updates made to a contract in one placeFields on PDF Add fields on PDF documentsSign later Share an offer and activate sign when readyVideo & screen recording Record, upload and share videos or screen recordingsInline comments Highlight text to comment directly in the contract, and sort by active or resolved commentsTwo-step authentication View contracts with two-step authentication to prevent unauthorized accessInternal approval workflow Add an internal approval step before signingSuggestions Add suggestions directly in the contract($)Section Rules Reveal or conceal specific sections based on rules and triggers($)Send contract over SMS Send invitation to contract as an SMS with a link to the contract($)($)Custom email domain Send Oneflow documents from any (sub)domain($)($) 
Sign 
Premium signature Sign with an externally verifiable qualified seal through Oneflow with a clickHandwritten signature Sign using a wet ink signature by drawing or writing your signatureSign on same device Let signatories sign a contract on the same device as you use to create/send the contractSigning order Reorder the signatories so that it complies with your workflowSMS signature Let signatories verify their identity via SMS before signing your contracts($)($)eID signature Let signatories sign a contract using eID($)($) 
Oneflow AI 
AI Assist Enable faster contract work, uncover blind spots and eliminate human errorsAI Import Upcoming Onboard Oneflow by instantly importing and organizing existing contracts into Oneflow platformAI Review Review individual contracts and receive recommendations to ensure compliance and get more favorable terms in the contracts you send and receive($)($)AI Insights Review your contracts in bulk to receive an instant due-diligence and compliance report across your entire portfolio($)($)AI Search Upcoming Perform intuitive and effective searches across all contracts($)($) 
Manage 
Data portability Export all your contracts in OneflowContract calendar Visualize contracts based on their lifecycle events in a calendar viewAdvanced filters Find contracts using granular filters such as tags, users, date range, etc.Data retention Configure data retention policies to avoid any information being stored passed its allowed timeAddress book Import or export all your contracts in OneflowMultiple Workspaces Organize your account and contracts to fit your organization structureTags Add tags to contracts and templates to make them easier to findLifecycle Configure lifecycle rules for your contracts and get notified on lifecycle eventsWorkspace branding Brand your Workspaces according to different affiliatesFolders Keep your Workspace structured. Create folders and subfolders in the specific document archive of a Workspace.Contract links Link related contracts together (e.g. subcontract, replacement, amendment)Custom reminders Create reminders with custom messages in the notification 
Analyze 
Dashboard See important KPIs about your contracts on a dashboardContract insights Track engagement in the contract such as visits, opens, and more 
Integrate 
Standard integrations Plug and play integrations with many systemsAPI access Access to Oneflow API to build powerful integrations with any system of your choiceWebhooks Use Oneflow Webhooks to subscribe to notifications for contract events or updatesWeb form as a service Automate contract creation with data from web forms of your choice($)($)Premium integrations Plug and play integrations with Salesforce and Microsoft Dynamics($)($) 
Security  
Two-step authentication Log into the Oneflow account with two-step authenticationAccount audit log Keep track of user access, timestamps, and everything that happens in your account 
User management 
User management Add and manage active usersCustom workspace rolesManage what users can do within each workspaceSingle sign-on Connect Oneflow to your own identity provider and utilize your own authentication policies($)Custom admin roles Manage which account level admin controls a user can change($)GroupsOrganize users in groups for better access management($)Limited usersAdd users with limited access($)($)SCIM Integrate your user identity provisioning($) 
Certifications 
ISO 27001 Oneflow’s commitment to protecting sensitive data and providing best-in-class information security management systemISO 9001 Oneflow’s commitment to excellence in delivering quality product and servicesISO 14001 Oneflow’s commitment to reducing its environmental impacts 
Support 
Help center + Getting started Find helpful articles, guides and videos at our Help CenterEmail support Get help via email with our support team anytime, anywhereChat support Get help via chat with our support team anytime, anywherePhone support Get help via phone with our support team during office hoursDedicated Success Manager Get personalized onboarding and success plans from a designated success manager($)($)Premium SLA Add an SLA to your plan($)($)

Can Oneflow help you save time and money? 
Oneflow provides a range of benefits that can help organizations save time and money across the contract lifecycle. 
 
Discover the ROI of Oneflow     
 
 
 
We love startups! 
 Scale your business with digital contracts at startup-friendly prices. Tell us about your startup and we’ll be in touch.  
 
  Tell us about your startup     
 
API and web forms 
 Use our API to automate contract workflows across all your systems. Make contract data processable and useful.  
 
  Message our team   
  Call +46 8 517 297 70         
 
Start using Oneflow 
 
 
 Is Oneflow free?   
 
 
We have a free plan that allows users to send, track and sign as many PDF contracts as possible. So if you’re happy with just signing PDF contracts, the answer is yes, it’s free. Forever.    
 
 What is the difference between free and trial accounts?   
 
 
With our free plan, you can upload, send, track, and sign unlimited PDF contracts. However, with the free plan, you’ll not be able to enjoy the full experience of contract magic. 
That’s why we also provide a trial of the full Oneflow experience for 14 days with no charge. With a trial account, you can try all the features our paid users love. For example, our contract editor. You can create stunning web-based contracts and make edits live, even after you’ve sent.    
 
 What happens after my trial ends?   
 
 
Your trial account will expire automatically after 14 days. Don’t worry, you’ll still be able to log into your account or access your contracts. After the trial, you’ll automatically be in our free plan.
     
 
 How can I extend my trial?   
 
 
Feel free to do so in the Oneflow app on your own by clicking on “Upgrade”. You can also leave us a message here.    
 
 What kind of onboarding support can I expect?   
 
 
Every user starts by attending an onboarding session facilitated by our friendly customer care team to run through the basics. We also have a comprehensive Help Center with all the how tos and tutorials that you need to get started. And you can always email us with your questions. Depending on your tier, you may also get a dedicated customer success manager to help with any questions you may have.        
 
 
  
Scale up or down 
 
There’s no need to commit to a huge investment for a perpetual license with our flexible SaaS platform and subscription-based pricing.   
  
Safer contracts 
 
It all boils down to this. Managing your contracts on one platform, in one place, is way more secure than storing in binders or folders that are hard to keep track of.       
 
Customer support 
 
  
Email, chat and phone support 
 
Got questions, feedback, or want to bounce your ideas off us? Reach out to us anytime. We’d love to hear from you.  
    
  
Help and training 
 
Join our weekly Oneflow Academy webinar or get a personalized training. Or, if you want to go at your own pace, find comprehensive resources on our Help Center.  
    
  
Experts on-hand 
 
Our skilled team of business and technical experts are passionate about solving your challenges. We’ll make sure you get the help you need to be successful.       
 
    
 
Have other questions? 
If you have more questions on our pricing and plans, contact us so we can help. 
 
Contact us 
Call +46 8 517 297 70

When you want to work quickly and efficiently, you really want to avoid any kind of sensory overload and get distracted by a messy dashboard where you’ll struggle to find features. In Oneflow, the placement of every feature makes sense.”  Read full story

We Care About Your Privacy 
We use cookies to personalize content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you've provided to them or that they've collected from your use of their services. You consent to our cookies if you continue to use our website. To change your preferences at any time, click on the “Change cookie settings” icon in the lower left corner.

 Cookie Policy      
 
 
 Privacy overview  
      
 
 
 
 
This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user experience possible. Cookie information is stored in your browser and performs functions such as recognizing you when you return to our website and helping our team to understand which sections of the website you find most interesting and useful.     
 Strictly necessary cookies 
 
Strictly necessary cookies are enabled to save your preferences for cookie settings and other important core functionality. You may disable these by changing your browser settings, but this may affect how the website functions. To change your preferences at any time, click on the “Change cookie settings” icon in the lower left corner to access this page. 
 
 
  Enable or Disable Cookies              
 Marketing cookies 
 
Cookies set by third party services or by us to track performance metrics, usage and marketing analytics to help us to personalize content and ads which improves your experience visiting Oneflow. We also share information about your use of our site with our analytics and advertising partners.
